GoLearn API
GoLearn API

Category

Endpointhttps://golearn2.azhari.my.id

Get Category List

GET
https://golearn2.azhari.my.id
/api/v1/categories

Ambil semua kategori.

Get Category List › Responses

200

OK

No data returned
GET/api/v1/categories
curl --request GET \
  --url https://golearn2.azhari.my.id/api/v1/categories
shell
Example Responses
{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "name": "Elektronik",
      "description": "Barang elektronik"
    },
    {
      "id": 2,
      "name": "Pakaian",
      "description": "Baju dan celana"
    }
  ],
  "message": "Categories retrieved successfully",
  "success": true
}
json
application/json

Create Category

POST
https://golearn2.azhari.my.id
/api/v1/categories

Buat kategori baru.

Create Category › Request Body

name
string
description
string

Create Category › Responses

Created

No data returned
POST/api/v1/categories
curl --request POST \
  --url https://golearn2.azhari.my.id/api/v1/categories \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --data '
{
  "name": "Kategori Baru",
  "description": "Deskripsi Kategori"
}
'
shell
Example Request Body
{
  "name": "Kategori Baru",
  "description": "Deskripsi Kategori"
}
json
application/json
Example Responses
{
  "data": {
    "id": 5,
    "name": "Kategori Baru",
    "description": "Deskripsi Kategori"
  },
  "message": "Category created successfully",
  "success": true
}
json
application/json

Get Category Detail

GET
https://golearn2.azhari.my.id
/api/v1/categories/1

Detail kategori.

Get Category Detail › Responses

200

OK

No data returned
GET/api/v1/categories/1
curl --request GET \
  --url https://golearn2.azhari.my.id/api/v1/categories/1
shell
Example Responses
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Elektronik",
    "description": "Barang elektronik"
  },
  "message": "Category detail retrieved successfully",
  "success": true
}
json
application/json

Update Category

PUT
https://golearn2.azhari.my.id
/api/v1/categories/1

Update kategori.

Update Category › Request Body

name
string
description
string

Update Category › Responses

200

OK

No data returned
PUT/api/v1/categories/1
curl --request PUT \
  --url https://golearn2.azhari.my.id/api/v1/categories/1 \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --data '
{
  "name": "Elektronik Murah",
  "description": "Barang elektronik diskon"
}
'
shell
Example Request Body
{
  "name": "Elektronik Murah",
  "description": "Barang elektronik diskon"
}
json
application/json
Example Responses
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Elektronik Murah",
    "description": "Barang elektronik diskon"
  },
  "message": "Category updated successfully",
  "success": true
}
json
application/json

Delete Category

DELETE
https://golearn2.azhari.my.id
/api/v1/categories/1

Hapus kategori.

Delete Category › Responses

200

OK

No data returned
DELETE/api/v1/categories/1
curl --request DELETE \
  --url https://golearn2.azhari.my.id/api/v1/categories/1
shell
Example Responses
{
  "data": null,
  "message": "Category deleted successfully",
  "success": true
}
json
application/json
